entries.text: Maybe releasing a CPAN module every day is crazy, but Neil Bowers puts his hand on something that is extremely difficult to do and very valuable: persistence. He has decided to release a new version of a CPAN module every day, but he also offers a bunch of less involved tasks that us, mere mortals, can stick to. So if you'd like to reach something just make sure you make a step every day. An alternative to this idea came from Eric Johnson recommending to write code every day.
entries.title: Release often
